original_text: And one night they both dreamed—the cupbearer and the baker of the king of Egypt, who were confined in the prison—each his own dream, and each dream with its own interpretation.
korean_text: 옥에 갇힌 애굽 왕의 술 맡은 자와 떡 굽는 자 두 사람이 하룻밤에 꿈을 꾸니 각기 그 내용이 다르더라

sentences.original_text: And one night they both dreamed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어느 밤에 그들은 둘 다 꿈을 꾸었는데

sentences.original_text: the cupbearer and the baker of the king of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 애굳 왕의 술 맡은 관원과 떡 굽는 관원이었으니

sentences.original_text: who were confined in the prison
and each dream with its own interpretation
